column1: Uncontrolled data used in path expression
column2: Accessing paths influenced by users can allow an attacker to access unexpected resources.
column4: This argument to a file access function is derived from [["user input (a command-line argument)"|"relative:///codeql-eg-C-TaintedPath.c:7:26:7:29"]] and then passed to fopen((unnamed parameter 0)).
